text: The 100 yards hurdles event at the 1926 Women's World Games was the second time the 100 yards hurdles was held at Women's World Games. The event took place in Gothenburg at the Slottsskogsvallen during the second day of the Games on 28 August 1926. At the 1930 Women's World Games the 100 yards hurdles was replaced by the 80 metres hurdles event. Polish Ludmila Sychrová won the final in a time of 11.8 seconds, ahead of the British women Edith White and Hilda Hatt. ==Results== ===Heats=== ====Heat 1==== Heat 1 had five participants.Häcklöpning, heat 1 It was won by Sychrová ahead of Hatt and Vandaelen. Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Q 2 Hilda Hatt Q 3 Henriette Vandaelen Q 4 Hanna Jędrzejewska 16.4 5 Ann-Margret Ahlstrand ====Heat 2==== An image of heat 2 shows four athletes.Häcklöpning, heat 2 Rank Name Nationality Time Notes ? title: 1926 Women's World Games – 100 yards hurdles
